module.short: connect to FastCGI backends for generating response content

parameter.name: socket
parameter.short: socket to connect to, either "ip:port" or "unix:/path"

description.textile: Don't confuse FastCGI with CGI! Not all CGI backends can be used as FastCGI backends (but you can use "fcgi-cgi":https://redmine.lighttpd.net/projects/fcgi-cgi/wiki to run CGI backends with lighttpd2).
Start php for example with spawn-fcgi: @spawn-fcgi -n -s /var/run/lighttpd2/php.sock -- /usr/bin/php5-cgi@

option.name: fastcgi.log_plain_errors
option.short: whether to prepend timestamp and other info to FastCGI stderr lines in the "backend" log
